thread.section_title: Sammydress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Sammydress 的点评意见 | sammydress.com
thread.title: Masayo Gardner
thread.title_full: Sammydress 的点评人 Masayo Gardner

author: Masayo Gardner
title: Masayo Gardner
text: I ordered a dress in January and not received yet. It takes so long to receive it, but so fast take my money (right away). I received no confirmation, no assurance, no service. I have no patient over this bad service. The best way is to give up whole thing and never, ever use this company. I lost my money.
